name: Assassin's Go
description:
This is an GO adaptation of the Classic Game Title "Hitman". 

It is a board game where you are supposed to get to  the end of the board  along the previously designed path avoiding or killing gaurds on your way.

Your Playstyle defines you.

p.s.: I will be constantly updating this game i.e. adding more levels or story mode elements. For that I would need a small help from you i.e. a small donation for my endevours.
